title: Devils re-sign star forward Timo Meier to eight-year, $70.4 million deal
description: The New Jersey Devils locked up star forward Timo Meier on Wednesday, just hours before the NHL Draft. The two sides agreed to an eight-year, $70.4 million extension.

description: The Chicago Blackhawks selected Canadian center Connor Bedard with the first overall pick in the 2023 NHL Draft, starting a new era in the Windy City.

title: Roma's Jose Mourinho hit with 10-day suspension over comments bashing referee
description: Roma boss José Mourinho was suspended four games an fined by the Italian FA on Wednesday for abuse toward referee Daniele Chiffi during a match last month

title: Texas' recording-breaking heat among hottest in the world, blamed for more than a dozen deaths
description: Texas has been walloped by a brutal heat wave this week, making it among the hottest places in the world, including regions of the Middle East and Africa.

title: Louisiana parents indicted for second time on murder charges, allegedly let daughter die on couch: reports
description: Two Louisiana parents were re-indicted by a grand jury Monday on murder charges connected to the death of their 36-year-old daughter who died on a couch in their home in 2022.

title: Biden says he met with China's Xi '68 times' and 'turned in all my notes' during tenure as VP

title: UConn presents newest Siberian husky mascot Jonathan XV
description: The University of Connecticut introduced the school's newest mascot, a 2-month-old Siberian husky, to the board of trustees on Wednesday. The Husky has been the University of Connecticut's mascot since 1933 when it was voted by the students. The previous Husky Jonathan XIV became the mascot in 2014

title: Florida woman leaves $300K estate to her seven Persian cats as adoption requests pour in
description: A woman from Tampa, Florida, has left her pricey estate to her seven pet cats after dying, according to multiple sources. Now, 156 applicants have inquired about adopting the felines.

title: Woman throws Molotov cocktail inside CA bank after waiting in line for ‘too long,’ sentenced to 2 years
description: A woman was sentenced to two years in prison after trying to firebomb a bank near Los Angeles, California, with a Molotov cocktail for waiting in line for “too long."

title: Minnesota crop-dusting airplane pilot dies after crashing into field
description: A crop-dusting airplane crashed in a field near Crookston, Minnesota, on June 27, 2023. The pilot was found dead inside the plane by emergency crews.

description: A reappointment vote that will decide Meagan Wolfe's future ended in partisan deadlock on June 27. 2023. Republicans are continuing calls for the Wisconsin elections official to resign.
